meanings.definition: A slang term for the penis.
meanings.sent1: He giggled when his little brother asked what a todger was.
meanings.sent2: The doctor used the proper term instead of saying todger.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's joke about the todger made the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: His todger was compared to a rocket ship in the hilarious cartoon.
meanings.sent5: The toddler proudly showed off his todger to his parents.
